ch0091_40_shirona/0101_0701_01_10:
Hi there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I was waiting for you to come.
ch0091_40_shirona/0101_0701_02_10:
Now then, let’s go to the beach and enjoy
our vacation! Or would you prefer to battle?
ch0091_40_shirona/7101_0701_01_10:
When I look at the beautiful ocean,
I remember the time I stayed at Caitlin’s villa
in Undella Town.
ch0091_40_shirona/7101_0701_02_10:
I didn’t just have fun at the beach—I also
explored the Abyssal Ruins. Every day was
packed, but I really enjoyed myself.
ch0091_40_shirona/7101_0701_03_10:
I’d love to make the most of my time on
Pasio as well!
ch0091_40_shirona/7102_0701_01_10:
I’ve been through countless battles with
Milotic since our days in Sinnoh.
ch0091_40_shirona/7102_0701_02_10:
That’s why sometimes I want her to relax
and recharge by spending time with me.
ch0091_40_shirona/7102_0701_03_10:
She looks so stunning and graceful when she
swims through the water. She’s so beautiful,
it takes my breath away!
ch0091_40_shirona/7103_0701_01_10: I chose an outfit that’s cool and comfortable.
ch0091_40_shirona/7103_0701_02_10: So I’m ready for my vacation!
ch0091_40_shirona/7103_0701_03_10:
I always like to dress the part. It gives me
such a boost!
ch0091_40_shirona/7104_0701_01_10:
Milotic is a beautiful Pokémon, so there are
many works of art featuring it.
ch0091_40_shirona/7104_0701_02_10:
It’s said that a glimpse of a Milotic and its
beauty will calm any hostile emotions you’re
feeling.
ch0091_40_shirona/7104_0701_03_10:
I think it’s also because of Milotic’s
beautiful heart!
ch0091_40_shirona/7105_0701_02_10:
If you need to do something, do it
right away.
ch0091_40_shirona/7105_0701_03_10:
Otherwise, you’ll have a hard time later—
like me. I still need to clean up my piles of
research materials...
ch0091_40_shirona/1701_0701_01_10: Perfect timing! I’ve got something for you.
ch0091_40_shirona/1701_0702_01_10:
I know you’re the kind of person to make the
most out of anything, so I’m sure you’ll put it
to good use...right?
ch0091_40_shirona/2501_0701_01_10:
Back when I was in Unova, I did some
diving near Undella Town to explore the
Abyssal Ruins.
ch0091_40_shirona/2501_0701_03_10: How about you—do you swim well?
ch0091_40_shirona/2501_0702_01_10:
We should have a swimming race with
Milotic sometime.
ch0091_40_shirona/2501_0702_02_10:
Though if she went all out, we’d have a
hard time keeping up.
ch0091_40_shirona/2511_0701_01_10:
Here on Pasio, people and Pokémon come
together from many different places.
ch0091_40_shirona/2511_0701_02_10:
It’s a valuable opportunity I’m very
grateful for.
ch0091_40_shirona/2511_0701_03_10:
In most cases, if you want to meet people
from around the world, you have to go on
a long and arduous journey.
ch0091_40_shirona/2511_0702_01_10:
I hope you get to meet many, many more
people and Pokémon.
ch0091_40_shirona/2511_0702_02_10: It’ll make your world even wider!
ch0091_40_shirona/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning. Are you fully awake?
If you’re heading out, don’t forget to
stay hydrated!
ch0091_40_shirona/3003_0701_01_10:
The temperature is rising with all this
excitement! I feel like jumping in the ocean
to cool down!
ch0091_40_shirona/3005_0701_01_10:
After a day of enjoying my vacation, I’ll
need to clean up that mountain of research
materials that’s been piling up...
